Package thatslife

Class ActionDeck

java.lang.Object
thatslife.Deck
thatslife.ActionDeck
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ActionDeck
extends Deck
This class is the container that initializes and holds all ActionCards.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    ActionCard[] beforeShuffle
    This attribute holds all the ActionCards before they were shuffled.

  • Field Details

    • beforeShuffle

      public ActionCard[] beforeShuffle
      This attribute holds all the ActionCards before they were shuffled.

  • Constructor Details

    • ActionDeck

      public ActionDeck​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players, int numCards)
      This constructor initializes the ActionCards
      Parameters:
      players - : ArrayList of Player - this list is not stored on this deck, but is just used to initialize the cards.
      numCards - : The number of cards to generate.

  • Method Details

    • drawCard

      public Card drawCard()
      This method overrides the superclass method for drawing cards. This is implemented as there is a possibility for all 50 cards to all used up. When this occurs, this method detects the empty cards ArrayList then refills it with the same cards that were generated at the start of the game then shuffles the deck.
      Overrides:
      drawCard in class Deck
      Returns:
      toReturn : Card (ActionCard)

    • getStrCards

      public java.lang.String[] getStrCards()
      This method generates a String array that contains all the string representations of all the cards. This method is only for use as indicated in the Machine Project specifications just to display card generation and does not impact the operation of the game.
      Returns:
      cardsData : String[]
